name: DOWTY CORP., Appellant, v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (McKELVEY), Appellee
name_abbreviation: Dowty Corp. v. Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board
docket_number: Appeal No. 67 Western District Appeal Docket 1993

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: DOWTY CORP., Appellant, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (McKELVEY), Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joseph F. Grochmal, Fried, Kane, Walters, Zuschlag & Grochmal, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Timothy Conboy, Daniel K. Bricmont, Caroselli, Spagnolli & Beachler, Pittsburgh, for Ronald McKelvey.
casebody.head_matter:
649 A.2d 982
DOWTY CORP., Appellant, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (McKELVEY), Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 8, 1994.
Decided April 20, 1994.
Joseph F. Grochmal, Fried, Kane, Walters, Zuschlag & Grochmal, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Timothy Conboy, Daniel K. Bricmont, Caroselli, Spagnolli & Beachler, Pittsburgh, for Ronald McKelvey.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
